column1: The 1st Respondent Board was established under Section 2(1) of the Debt Conciliation Board Act
No. 39 of 1949. This is a statutory body. Hence this Court is having the jurisdiction to hear this
Application.  The  learned  Counsel  for  the  Petitioner  argues  that  the  objection  raised  by  the
Learned Counsel for the Respondents is untenable in law.
Before invoking the jurisdiction of this Court, the petitioner should act in terms of Section 54 of
